channel.title: Helpp
channel.description:
So I have a downloadable client and it's worked for 3 people, but not for my cousin, I had it run on his jre and jdk but I just can't get it to work, any ideas? These are all of the run.bats I tried on him
Windows 7 run @echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
and a 64bit Run @echo off Title BrokenX START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 Echo Please wait while the client loads. This may take a while. exit

item.title: Helpp
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Well it either says it cant find the path or error in main file, but his jdk or jre is in his program files (x86) so idk why it cant find them.

Read full topic

item.title: Helpp
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

So I have a downloadable client and it’s worked for 3 people, but not for my cousin, I had it run on his jre and jdk but I just can’t get it to work, any ideas? These are all of the run.bats I tried on him

Windows 7 run
@echo off
title Client
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

and a 64bit Run
@echo off
Title BrokenX
START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
Echo Please wait while the client loads. This may take a while.
exit

Read full topic
